name: Billy's Birthday Party
description:
"This is the story of Billy's at his birthday party."

Controls :
- Use arrows/WASD to move.
- Press Space to interact.

This game was developped for the "Low Effort 14 Game Jam".
All the submissions here (very funny btw) : https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-14/entries

Will you find the easter egg ?
